                   GROUP iNFORMATiON                

                                                 

                                                





         SChiZO is one of the longest living MPEG-4 release groups

         in the scene. Since our inception in March of 2001 we have

         been catering to the needs of DivX enthusiasts everywhere

         by releasing high-quality DVDRips of the finest films from

         around the world. Our dedication to quality is shown by the

         lack of any technical nukes in our 200+ release history.

         In recent months we have continued to grow as we established

         our TV division, PHRENiC, dedicated to bringing the SChiZO

         philosophy to the TVRips scene.



         SChiZO does not have any public means of contact, nor do we

         plan to add any. Remember, we do this for fun and don't

         respond to unsolicited offers from unknown people.
